name: Crack a Bottle
description:
Crack a Bottle, is a highly addictive Bottle Smashing Game! Simply control the ball and throw it at the bottles on the screen. Receive bonus points for hitting the Bottles successfully without missing! Watch out for numerous obstacles, and beat each level quota before time expires!

This intense game includes a plethora of levels, along with a good variety of alcohol bottles, at a variety of bar scenes from around the world!

This intense game will leave you satisfied, and addicted!

- Realistic sounds
- Fun and easy gameplay
- Gorgeous graphics
- Visually pleasing special effects
- Very challenging, highly qualitative gameplay.

Download Crack a Bottle today, and compete with your friends!
